CUSTOMER INFORMATION INFORMATION SHEET /KNOW YOUR POLICY

Sum Assured on Death for each Policy Year

1

5. Policy Coverage / benefits payable and shall be based on the chosen interest rate p.a. effective on an equated yearly repayment basis, irrespective of the actual loan repayment. At the inception, the Sum Assured on Death shall be equal to the Basic Sum Assured and subsequently at each Policy Year, Sum Assured on Death shall be as mentioned in the Risk Cover Schedule. Death Benefit as specified in the Risk Cover Schedule may be higher or lower than the actual outstanding loan. Benefits payable on death: Under Limited premium payment policy, “Sum Assured on Death” is defined as the higher of: 105% of “Total Premiums Paid” upto the date of death; or Absolute amount assured to be paid on death. Under Single premium policy, “Sum Assured on Death” is defined as the absolute amount assured to be paid on death. Absolute amount assured to be paid on death shall be as specified in the Risk Cover Schedule. Benefit payable on maturity: No Maturity Benefit shall be payable. Surrender benefits: No surrender value will be available under this Policy. However, on receipt of request for surrender under a Single Premium and Limited Premium payment policy, an amount equal to Unexpired Risk Premium Value, if any, shall be payable. The formulae to arrive at such amount have been detailed under Condition 4 of Part D of Policy Document. Condition 1.A of Part C Condition 1.B of Part C Condition 4 of Part D

5. Policy Coverage / benefits payable and shall be based on the chosen interest rate p.a. effective on an equated yearly repayment basis, irrespective of the actual loan repayment. At the inception, the Sum Assured on Death shall be equal to the Basic Sum Assured and subsequently at each Policy Year, Sum Assured on Death shall be as mentioned in the Risk Cover Schedule. Death Benefit as specified in the Risk Cover Schedule may be higher or lower than the actual outstanding loan. Benefits payable on death: Under Limited premium payment policy, “Sum Assured on Death” is defined as the higher of: 105% of “Total Premiums Paid” upto the date of death; or Absolute amount assured to be paid on death. Under Single premium policy, “Sum Assured on Death” is defined as the absolute amount assured to be paid on death. Absolute amount assured to be paid on death shall be as specified in the Risk Cover Schedule. Benefit payable on maturity: No Maturity Benefit shall be payable. Surrender benefits: No surrender value will be available under this Policy. However, on receipt of request for surrender under a Single Premium and Limited Premium payment policy, an amount equal to Unexpired Risk Premium Value, if any, shall be payable. The formulae to arrive at such amount have been detailed under Condition 4 of Part D of Policy Document. Condition 1.A of Part C Condition 1.B of Part C Condition 4 of Part D

in

Condition 8 of

repayment of loan:

Part D

If a Life Assured repays the outstanding loan

before the end of the policy term, he/she shall

have the following two options:

To surrender his/her insurance cover.

To continue the policy till the end of the

Policy Term.

case of Linked

7. Option available (in case of Annuity product) 8. Riders opted, if any 9. Exclusions (events where insurance coverage is not payable), if any. 10. Waiting/ lien Period, if any 11. Grace period 12. Free Look Period 13. Lapse, paid-up and revival of the Policy Not Applicable Not Applicable Suicide Exclusion: The provisions related to claim payment in case of death due to suicide shall be subject to the conditions as specified herein under: Under Limited Premium Payment policy: If the Life Assured (whether sane or insane) commits suicide at any time within 12 months from the date of commencement of risk under the policy or from the date of revival of the policy, as applicable, the Nominee or Beneficiary of the Life Assured shall be entitled to 80% of the total premiums paid (excluding any extra premium and taxes, if collected explicitly) till the date of death, provided the policy is in force. This clause shall not be applicable for a lapsed policy as nothing is payable under such policies. Under Single Premium policy: If the Life Assured (whether sane or insane) commits suicide at any time within 12 months from the date of commencement of risk under the policy, the Nominee or Beneficiary of the Life Assured shall be entitled to 80% of the Single Premium paid excluding any taxes, extra premium , if any. Not Applicable 30 Days 30 Days The following applicable in case of Limited premium payment policies: Lapse: A policy would lapse on non- payment of due premium within the days of grace. All the benefits shall cease after the expiry of grace period from the date of First Unpaid Premium. However, an amount equal to Unexpired Risk Premium Value, if Condition 2 of Part F Condition 3 of Part C Condition 7 of Part D Condition 3 and Condition 4 of Part D

any, shall be payable and the policy shall
